== Main Inclusion Report for wsdl4j ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/w/wsdl4j available for all supported architectures
# ''Rationale:''
** build dependency of axis
 0. ''Security:''
** <nowiki>[[http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvekey.cgi?keyword=wsdl4j|CVE entries]]</nowiki>: None
** <nowiki>[[http://secunia.com/search/?search=wsdl4j|Secunia history]]</nowiki>: None
** Java library package, no binary
** Quick and shallow source code review performed.
 0. ''Quality assurance:''
** Library package works out of the box, no debconf questions
** Package not in Debian.
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** <nowiki>[[http://www.pathname.com/fhs/|FHS]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.de.debian.org/doc/debian-policy/|Debian Policy]]</nowiki> compliant
** Use cdbs packaging system (debhelper/cdbs/dbs), simple-patchsys
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** Dependencies all in main
